TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner
Public Class DataSourceDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner Implements IDataSourceDesigner
type DataSourceDesigner = class inherit ControlDesigner interface IDataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在設計主機中，為 類別提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a design host for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是基底類別的資料來源設計工具，例如， ，和類別。The class is the base class for data source designers, such as the , , and classes. 如果您建立新的資料來源控制項，您也可以建立自訂的控制項設計工具為您的控制項，並從它衍生出來類別。If you create a new data source control, you might also want to create a custom control designer for your control and derive it from the class. 類別有兩個事件的方法：和方法。The class has two event methods: the and methods. 這兩個這些事件可以暫時停用與方法，以設定屬性。Both of these events can be temporarily disabled with the method, which sets the property. 事件的方法可透過一次啟用方法。The event methods can be enabled again with the method. 有兩個可供您評估結構描述或檢視表的對應項，而不需建立類別的執行個體的靜態方法：There are two static methods that you can use to evaluate the equivalency of schemas or views without creating an instance of the class: - 方法會比較兩個結構描述。The method compares two schemas. - 方法會比較兩個檢視的結構描述。The method compares the schemas of two views. ## Examples 下表所示，下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用數個其他小型自訂類別，自訂資料來源控制項。The following code example shows how to use a custom data source control with several other small custom classes, as listed in the following table. |自訂類別Custom class|衍生自Derived from| |------------------|------------------| |`CustomDataSource`|| |`CustomDataSourceDesigner`|| |`CustomDataSourceView`|| |`CustomDesignDataSourceView`|| |`BookListViewSchema`|| |`CustomIDFieldSchema`|| |`CustomTitleFieldSchema`|| |`BookItem` （兩個欄位的資料結構。）`BookItem` (A two-field data structure.)|| 在之後編譯程式碼範例，請開啟.aspx 頁面在設計檢視中，然後設定`DataSourceID`自訂資料來源控制項的 ID 屬性。After compiling the code example, open the .aspx page in Design view and then set the `DataSourceID` property to the ID of the custom data source control. [!code-csharp[DataSourceDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/CS/DataSourceDesignerSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataSourceDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/VB/DataSourceDesignerSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataSourceDesignerSample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/CS/DataSourceDesignerSample.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataSourceDesignerSample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/VB/DataSourceDesignerSample.aspx#6)]

span.para: 若要提供在衍生類別中的設計階段動作清單功能表命令，您必須覆寫屬性，以傳回自訂物件的自訂項目衍生自物件。
To provide commands for the action list menu at design time in a derived class, you must override the property to return a custom object with custom items that are derived from the object.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計主應用程式會呼叫建構函式在執行階段。The constructor is called by the design host at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

summary.span: 取得用於在設計階段建立動作清單功能表的項目清單。

span.span: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.

value.span: 物件，包含控制項設計工具的動作清單項目。

span.span: A object containing the action list items for the control designer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立簡單的複合控制項，與控制項和控制，以及要設定屬性`Text`這兩個內部的控制項屬性，以及和屬性的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a control and a control, along with properties to set the `Text` properties on both internal controls, as well as the and properties of the control. 關聯的控制項設計工具類別會建立三個命令，每個可在控制項上設定兩個屬性和其設定可回復的恢復功能設計主應用程式中。An associated control designer class creates three commands, each of which sets two properties on the control, and whose settings can be rolled back with the undo functionality in the design host. 雖然程式碼範例不會使用自訂物件，並說明如何覆寫屬性。Although the code example does not use a custom object, it illustrates how to override the property. [!code-csharp[DesignerInvokeTransactedChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerInvokeTransactedChange/CS/InvokeTransactedChangeSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerInvokeTransactedChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerInvokeTransactedChange/VB/InvokeTransactedChangeSample.vb#1)]

span.para: 當您建立的自訂類別，衍生自類別，您必須覆寫屬性。在覆寫方法中，先呼叫基底類別，來建立預設物件，然後再新增自訂的專屬於您的類別的動作清單。

When you create a custom class that is derived from the class, you must override the property. In your override method, first call the base class to create the default object, and then add a custom list of actions that are specific to your class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CanConfigure As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanConfigure { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否可以呼叫 方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以呼叫 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if can be called; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中啟用或停用特定資料來源的設計階段組態的自訂類別的屬性。Use the property in a custom class to enable or disable design-time configuration for a specific data source. 設計主應用程式這類[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]使用屬性來判斷是否要設定資料來源的命令會出現在動作清單功能表在設計階段。A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] uses the property to determine whether a command to configure the data source appears in the action list menu at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CanRefreshSchema As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRefreshSchema { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否可以呼叫 方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以呼叫 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the can be called; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來啟用或停用重新整理結構描述的特定資料來源在設計階段功能的衍生類別中的屬性。Use the property in a derived class to enable or disable the ability to refresh the schema at design time for a specific data source. 如果您的應用程式需要的不變的資料結構，且永遠不會變更結構描述，您想屬性，以傳回`false`。If your application requires an invariant data structure and the schema will never change, you want the property to return `false`. 設計主應用程式這類[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]使用屬性來判斷是否要重新整理結構描述的命令的動作清單功能表中顯示在設計階段。A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] uses the property to determine whether a command to refresh the schema appears in the action list menu at design time. 在設計中裝載這類[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您可以看到藉由完成下列程序的作用中的屬性：In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can see the property in action by completing the following process: 1. 在頁面上，將放或控制項。On your page, place a or an control. 2. 在 [設計] 檢視 [動作] 清單中，按一下**設定**。In Design view, on the action list, click **Configure**. 3. 移除資料來源中的幾個欄位。Remove a few fields from the data source. 4. 在 動作 清單中，按一下 **重新整理結構描述**。On the action list, click **Refresh Schema**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不支援類別，不過，它會覆寫繼承的自訂資料來源設計工具類別。The method is not supported in the class; however, it can be overridden by custom data source designers inheriting from the class. 在設計中裝載這類[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您可以看到中藉由完成下列程序的動作方法：In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can see the method in action by completing the following process: 1. 放或在頁面上的控制項。Put a or an control on your page. 2. 在 [動作] 清單中，按一下 [設計] 檢視中**設定**。In Design view, on the action list, clicking **Configure**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會通知的繫結至相關聯的資料來源重新整理其控制項在設計主應用程式中的每個控制項的控制項設計工具。The method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host. 方法可以隱藏具有方法或來電 800-659-3579方法的引數`false`。The method can be suppressed with the method or by calling the method with an argument of `false`.
